Summary: on the 43rd floor of apartment complex in boystown in chicago. saw a orange red very large object coming in the direction of the building. coming from the right to the left. the left being lake michigan. was glowing very bright. traveling fast and went
divs: Sighting Detailssaw a giant red orange flame from apartment complex on 43rd floor. i face chicago and have a wraparound window plan in boystown i was visiting my boyfriend who is living in chicago for the summer. were were in park place towers. saw it coming from the right in the distance and head over chicago then to the left to lake michigan. it was very bright. did not fall to earth. just traveled across like a flame but it was red glowing and ornage like. had no trail. but it looked like it was on fire bc it was flickering. it looked to be very large and was moving very fast. its scared the sh*t out of me. was wondering if anyone else say it?
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around June 2nd 2012
